poems.title: Echoes of Antiquity
poems.author: Noah Brown
poems.excerpt: In echoes of antiquity, whispers of kingdoms lost...
poems.full_text: In echoes of antiquity, whispers of kingdoms lost. Sands of time, tales etched in stone, the legacy of empires and conquerors. Explore the past, for in history's tapestry, lessons await.

poems.title: Ancient Rhythms
poems.author: Isabella Carter
poems.excerpt: In ancient rhythms, the heartbeat of civilizations past...
poems.full_text: In ancient rhythms, the heartbeat of civilizations past. Pyramids rise, temples stand, echoes of cultures long gone. Uncover the mysteries, for in the annals of time, stories unfold.
